name: MERN Stack - Budget App
description:
Cash Flow provides a way to track personal expenses in a user-friendly way. It is built using the MERN Stack, with React Bootstrap and Recharts incorporated into the user interface.
The app is currently in development with plans of adding user authentication and saving goals.

name: Raspberry Pi - Braille printer
description: This project aims to create a Braille printer using a Raspberry Pi, a camera, OpenCV, and Tesseract. The printer captures a snapshot of text, extracts the characters using optical character recognition (OCR), and translates each character into movement instructions for three motors. These motors generate a strip of paper with corresponding Braille tactile bumps.
